{"id":541673961,"lang":"cpp","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1629508841,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/541673961/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Encode and Decode TinyURL","memory":"7.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n\n    // Encodes a URL to a shortened URL.\n\n    unordered_map<string,string> mp;\n    int num = 0;\n\n    string encode(string longUrl) {\n\n        num++;\n        string addon = to_string(num);\n        string ans = \"http://tinyurl.com/\";\n        ans+=string(addon);\n        mp[ans] = longUrl;\n        return ans;\n\n    }\n\n    // Decodes a shortened URL to its original URL.\n    string decode(string shortUrl) {\n        return mp[shortUrl];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"encode-and-decode-tinyurl"}
